name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Benjamin VELASQUEZ, Appellant (two cases)

judges: Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, Jj.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Benjamin VELASQUEZ, Appellant (two cases).

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
JONES, former C. J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Nino V. Tinari, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., James Garrett, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
373 A.2d 455
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Benjamin VELASQUEZ, Appellant (two cases).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 14, 1976.
Decided June 3, 1977.
Nino V. Tinari, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Asst. Dist. Atty., Chief, Appeals Div., James Garrett, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, Jj.
